body:
Comment 1: 
Your program is confusing equality of a reflect.Value with equality of the value stored
in the reflect.Value.  It's true that the behaviour changed in 1.4, but this was never
part of the reflect interface.  What you need to write is something like
http://play.golang.org/p/SPmTktOv18 .
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
